name: baikal
description: Baikal is a lightweight CalDAV and CardDAV server that enables users to host their own calendars and contact lists. Ideal for minimal self-hosted setups, it supports syncing with desktop and mobile clients via standard protocols.
features: CalDAV Server: Host your own calendar server. Independent scheduling.
CardDAV Support: Manage contacts on your own server. Private address book.
Calendar Sync: Sync calendars across all devices. Universal access.
Contact Sync: Keep contacts updated everywhere. Seamless synchronization.
Lightweight: Minimal resource requirements. Efficient operation.
Client Compatible: Works with desktop and mobile calendar apps. Universal compatibility.
Standard Protocols: Uses CalDAV and CardDAV standards. Wide support.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your calendar and contacts. Data privacy.
